com.gushikustudios.rube.loader

Class RubeSceneLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gushikustudios.rube.loader.RubeSceneLoader

  • public class RubeSceneLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads a json file and returns a RubeScene.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RubeSceneLoader

        public RubeSceneLoader()

      • RubeSceneLoader

        public RubeSceneLoader(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world)
        This constructor accepts a predefined Box2D world. If it is non-null, scene objects will be added to that rather than creating a world from scratch.
        Parameters:
        world -

      • RubeSceneLoader

        public RubeSceneLoader(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
               com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json gameJson)

    • Method Detail

      • loadScene

        public RubeScene loadScene(com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle _file)
        Use this to load in an individual .json scene. Any previously loaded scene data will be lost (including Box2D objects!)
        Parameters:
        _file - File to read.
        Returns:
        The scene represented by the RUBE JSON file.

      • addScene

        public RubeScene addScene(com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle _file)
        This method accumulates objects defined in a scene, allowing several separate RUBE .json files to be combined. Objects are added to the scene's data, as well as within the Box2D world that is ultimately returned.
        Parameters:
        _file - The JSON file to parse
        Returns:
        The cumulative scene
